name: Dungeons & Dwarves
description:
My submission to "Newbie Jam 2"

You play as a Lich protecting its lair from invading dwarves.
Crush them with your undead might.

*Game might chug on Chrome, Firefox works more reliably

Art by Shauné Burchell
Writing by Nathan Hayes

Themes:
Death = Progress : Dead units become skeleton piles, which can be used to summon stronger units

Colour palette used for art https://lospec.com/palette-list/slso8

Assets Used:
Dungeon Ground Texture by Pixel Indie (Unity Asset Store)
Yughues Free Ground Materials by Yughues (Unity Asset Store)
Deutsch Gothic Font from DaFont
Fantasy Towns Music Pack by Chris Logsdon (Unity Asset Store)
